choices: "I had a growth spurt last night."
"I never grew past 4'5""
"My sister was always the tallest person in my family."
"The average height of a woman is 6' tall"
You type in something else...
1.content:
Original chapter by Kardo

You sit down in front of your new typewriter. You always fancied yourself a writer, so this is perfect for practicing.

You start typing, then realize you forgot to put paper in the machine. Surprisingly, paper is coming out of the machine anyway, with the few words you typed already on it. You tear the paper out, and crumple it up. Once the paper is crumpled up, it disappears.

You realize that something strange is going on, but you decide to type out something simple. "Today was cold."

Instantly, the temperature in the room drops 40 degrees.

You hear a knock at the door, and your sister, Melissa, walks in, wearing a sweater and sweatpants, and hands you some hot chocolate. "Weird how it's so cold during summer, huh?" she says, off-hand. She looks down at your typewriter and laughs. "Hey, you forgot the paper!" she says, looking down into the machine. That's strange, the peice of paper was sticking out with the words you just wrote on it. You point to it and say "What about that piece right there?" She laughs and says "Ah yes, invisible paper, of course."

This meant, of course, that she couldn't see the paper. You take the paper off and crumple it up, and immediately the heat returns, and the cocoa becomes a glass of lemonade, and your sister is wearing shorts and a shirt.

You now understand the basics of the typewriter, but want to try two more things. You type "Suddenly, my sister hugs me!" and you quickly feel her hugging you. "What's that for?" you ask. She responds, "No reason, just felt like doing it." The paper disappears by itself, presumably because the event happened and is over with now.

You next type "In a minute, I'll get a dollar from the sky." You suspect that this won't work, but you sit back, waiting. Suddenly, you feel something on your head, which your sister snatches off. "Whoa! How did this dollar stay on the ceiling?" Melissa asks, showing it to you. It's a dollar bill, which was apparently stuck to the ceiling. The paper disappears, its work done.

You realize the kind of things you could do with this, so you start typing...
1.title: The beginning of something strange and mystical.

choices: "I have a really tall girlfriend who loves to hug me."
"If any woman hugs me, they get taller, but don't know it."
"Every woman I know has always been at least two feet taller than me."
"My sister suddenly starts growing after she hugged me."
"Any adult woman simply can't resist hugging me."
12.content:
Original chapter by TheMM

...you quickly type out, "I never grew past four feet, five inches tall." At this point, you feel yourself greatly decrease in height as everything seems to grow bigger, though it's you actually shrinking. Your clothes shrink with you as you get smaller. New memories suddenly go through your head, though your still have your old ones. You now remember that since you never got taller than most kids, only child-sized clothing could really fit you. You eventually get clothing custom made that look more adult but fit your small body.

Melissa suddenly hugs you again, though you hadn't typed that. As she hugs you (nearly lifting you out of your chair) she exclaims, "Ohhh, you're just so small and adorable! You just look like someone a girl would love to hug!"

This gave you an idea. Turning back to the typewriter, which oddly seemed a bit smaller, you quickly typed out...
12.title: You're a bit shorter

choices: Ashley and Melissa are the same height.
Another girl arrives.
If a girl compares height or size with me, she gets taller.
121.content:
Suddenly, the doorbell rings right after you finished typing.

"I bet I can guess who that is." Melissa teased. She gently ruffled your hair before going over to sit at the couch, kicking off her flip-flops. You roll your eyes, hopping off your chair and making your way to the door. It felt strange from your new perspective, being in a familiar place but it feeling unfamiliar. Finally, you reach the door, the trip taking longer than usual, you open the door, and once you see your new girlfriend, new memories flood in.

Her name was Ashley, long black flowing hair, brown eyes, a simple t-shirt, shorts and flats. You remember growing up with her. For the most part, you were taller than her, but then came the time when you had stopped growing at 4'5". Ashley of course kept growing, eventually reaching your height and then surpassing it.

Once she had reached about 5' tall, she has grown accustom to hugging you, even picking you up too. As time passed and she grew taller and taller, having to look further and further down at you as she got taller, you two grew closer, eventually becoming a couple.

All that lead to where you are now, a 4'5" man dating a 6'4" women who loved you dearly. Ashley scooped you up and planted a kiss on you.

"Hello my little cutie." She smiled. Yup chuckled.

"Hey my adorable giant." You respond.

"Hey Ash." Melissa had turned around on the couch and waved to Ashley.

"Hey there Mel." She waved back. "What have you two been up today?" She asked, setting you down, allowing you to really get a sense of how tall she was compared to you.

"Oh, nothing much, little bro over here is enjoying his new typewriter. Though without any paper." Melissa shrugged. Ashley simply giggled. See a chance, you make your way back to the typewriter and decide to type in something else.
121.title: "I have a really tall girlfriend who loves ...

choices: You quickly decide to type something else.
You decide to have a little fun.
Before you can type anything else, Melissa hugs you again!
122.content:
Original chapter by Beetle

"Come here, you!" Melissa leans in and gives you a big huge."

Immediately a puzzled expression overcomes Melissa's face and she straightens her posture. "I feel funny." you hear her say faintly.

You whip your gaze around just in time to see the girl shoot up 2 inches in height, but she doesn't seem aware of it!

"M-Melissa, you alright there?"

"Yea of course. Never better. Why?" She stated matter-of-factly, arms akimbo.

"Oh nothing, I-. I thought I just thought-...nevermind."

"Ohhh!! You're such a cutie when you jumble all your words up like that!" Melissa leaned quickly, arms spread.

"Wait Melissa, no!" But it was too late. She wrapped her kind arms around you, growing larger in the embrace. Though this time she wasn't letting go! Her body continued to grow larger and large while hugging you. You begin to feel her breasts pressing against your back, slowly swelling with each passing second.

"Uhhhh, Mel-Melissa. C-Could you let go of m--me please?" you managed to speak.

"Oh sure thing. Sorry about that. You're just so cuddly I can't help it sometimes!" She swung back perpendicular to the ground, breasts jossling around her shirt in the process.

You stared up at her, wide eyed, amazed by the amount of height you've just given to this completely unaware girl.

"You alright there buddy? You seem spooked." Melissa asked in concern

"Uhh yea I'm fine! I've just been having an off day is all." You half-heartingly laugh."
122.title: "If any woman hugs me, they get taller, but...

choices: Her head reached the ceiling
Her head went through the roof
She became bigger than the house
1223.content:
But after witnessing the dangerous implications of the typewriter, you decided that it would be a good idea to type the limit of how high she could grow from hugging you. But before you could face yourself back to the typewriter, you saw your sister blushing heavily while slowly walking closer to you.

"Is something bothering you Melissa?"

"N-No, it's just that you look even....smaller"

"And how is that bothering you?"

"I-It's just that.... you're now even more adorable, more cuddly, more..... huggable...." Melissa said while spreading her arms even further while standing right in front of you in her new towering form

"Melissa, don't do it"

"I know i'm not supposed to, but..... I JUST NEED TO!"

Without warning, Melissa had rapped her arms around you while you feel yourself being suspended into the air. You could feel yourself rising higher as Melissa grew bigger during her hug

"I feel funny again, but it actually feel... good. In fact, it feels too good! Why does it feel SO GOOD?!"

"I don't know but can you be kind enough to release me?"

"I'm sorry but I can't stop hugging you! It feels so good to have you in my arms!"

So without interruption, Melissa kept hugging you with all her might and passion as she kept on grow bigger and bigger, and while she enjoyed every second of it, you continued trying and failing to free yourself from her grasp. But after she'd noticed this, she came up with her own solution.

"Hmmm, so you don't like my hugs, do you?"

"I just want to continue writing, I don't have time for this" You said while you were finally able to get hold of the typewriter again.

"....Alright, but just a little more."

As you were about to type, Melissa had tightened her grip on you, which made you drop the typewriter. And as her amazon sized body kept on growing bigger, so did the grin on her face, and that continued to be the case until she had finally lost her grip on you, which wouldn't happen until:
1223.title: Before you can type anything else, Melissa hugs...

choices: "If a woman touches me, she grows without knowing it."
"Being near women makes them have growth spurts."
"I never grew past 3'0""
123.content:
Original chapter by Kardo

You look over at your sister when you finish typing, and find that you have to look up even more to see her face. She was around 6'7", making her seem gigantic. You gain even more new memories, and you can remember women that you met being really tall when you met them, or they grew taller shortly after you met them. You distinctly remember becoming friends with a girl almost the same height as you, but the next day she had grown an inch taller, then another 2 inches the next day. This continued until she was about 6'10". You remember how she had to look farther and farther down at you, but you also remember her not being mean about it, and you're still friends today.

Melissa leans on the back of your chair. "You having fun with that typewriter?" she says, giggling. If only she knew...

You get an idea, and type...
123.title: "Every woman I know has always been at leas...

choices: Everytime a women says something related to size, she grows.
Women's feet are at least half your size.
Something else.
1233.content:
Once you finish typing, you once again are overcome by the feeling of shrinking. Everything around you becomes bigger from your perspective, the floor get further away, the chair gets bigger, and Melissa's face gets further away. The only thing not changing from your perspective was the typewriter.

"I still can't get over how big I am, and how small you are." Mellissa says once you stop shrinking. She seems to have retained her previous growth, now over twice your own height. You look over her, from head, to feet and back to head again, and get an idea.
1233.title: "I never grew past 3'0""

choices: "She had grown a few inches last night, and would do so again every night after"
"Everyone else in the world was slowly shrinking"
"Because throughout the day, she was getting taller."
"She was actually a goddess, and had lost her memories and size"
"She's kinda weird."
13.content:
Original chapter by Kardo

After you finish typing this sentence, you look over at Melissa. She looks the same... She bends down, seeing something, but then straightens up. and up. She looks down at you from her new height of 6'1", and grins. She was definitely the tallest person in your family now, as you were only 5'8".

She sits down in a chair next to you and nods toward the lemonade. "I didn't poison it, if that's what you're thinking." she says, giggling slightly. You reach over and drink it, finding it more refreshing than usual. That's rather strange, you think.

Melissa leans back in her chair and sighs, then says "I sure feel tall today. I mean, I'm usually tall, but today I just really feel huge. Not that I dislike that or anything, but it is rather strange."

You wonder if the typewriter left some residual effects that would cause this, but you don't feel the need to explore that any further quite yet.

You turn back to the typewriter, and try something new, feeling inspired.

"The reason my sister felt so tall today was..."
13.title: Tall Sister

choices: "...daily"
"...constantly"
"...daily, but Melissa was growing at the same pace."
132.content:
Original chapter by Kardo

As soon as you finish typing this, you feel the head of the chair rise upwards slightly, then stop. You look around, but somehow you already know that you've shrunk a couple inches. You wrote "slowly" so you expect the shrinking to occur daily, rather than any faster way.

You decide not to have to guess, and type in a new sentence. "Everyone else was shrinking..." but then you can't think of what to do. While a slow shrink was what you were planning, if it was fast, that could be interesting too...

You finish with...
132.title: "Everyone else in the world was slowly shri...

choices: Make her grow whever she stands up from a chair.
Shrink her for a different experiment.
Grow her some other way.
135.content:
Original chapter by Kardo

Your sister grins, then just says "I guess I'm just kinda weird." and stands up, once again towering over you. This gives you an idea, so you type "She decided to sit back down in her chair" and Melissa immediately follows the command of the typewriter.

You grin, and...
135.title: "She's kinda weird."

choices: "Women with brothers grow taller than other women."
"Melissa has a twin sister that is exactly like her except she's really tall."
"Melissa loves being tall, and wants to be taller."
"Women love being tall, and want to be taller."
"Women have sudden growth spurts randomly."
14.content:
Original chapter by Kardo

When you finish typing this sentence, you look over at your sister. She's smiling down at you from her new vantage point of 6 feet, as she was average height before. Melissa ruffles your hair, and you decide to flesh out your new universe.

"Women stop aging at 21 years old, and cannot become obese." you type. As soon as you finish, a huge burst of light comes out of the typewriter. When it fades, you turn on the little tv by your desk and flip through the channels. Channel after channel, you see nothing but youthful women, and mostly of a 6' or higher stature.

You smile, then realize you should probably grant men the same boon. "Men stop aging at 20 years old, and cannot become obese" you type. There's another flash, and when it dims, the men on television have become much younger looking, but still usually shorter than their female cohorts.

You pause, and then decide to type...
14.title: Raising the Average

choices: "Melissa's teasing makes her grow, and she knows it."
"Melissa's teasing makes her grow, and she's completely unaware."
"Melissa has sudden growth spurts, but the cause is unknown."
143.content:
Original chapter by unknown author

Melissa stares at you. When you finish typing, the paper disappears as normal. Melissa suddenly gets a blank expression on her face. After a few moments, she seems to return to normal. She giggles, and places her arms on your head. "I'd feel annoyed that you're paying attention to that typewriter instead of spending time with your sister, but that wouldn't be..." She pauses, then finishes, "big of me."

She bursts out into laughter, and it takes her about a minute to calm down. "Get it?" she says, smiling and wiping away a tear. "It's 'cause I'm tall." She grins and leans down, her face now level with yours. "And who knows? Maybe I'm not done growing yet..."

You think, then start typing...
143.title: Melissa's Desire for Height

choices: "Melissa is unable to harm anyone accidentally."
"Melissa is 6' again, and shows more restraint in her growth this time."
You type in something else...
1431.content:
Original chapter by unknown author

Her grin widens as you finish typing. She kneels down, until you have to look down at her. "I used to be smaller." She says, looking up at you. "But then... I grew." She starts standing up, her head rising slowly. "And grew..." she says, her head passing yours. You stand up, so that she still looks shorter. "And GREW..." she stands up faster, her head quickly moving past yours, until she's standing up straight at her normal height. "AND GREW!" She finishes, her head somehow rising higher and higher until her head hits the ceiling.

She looks down at you, and makes up a story as she grows.

"But you see, dear brother..." she says, "I didn't stop there." She reaches up and pushes against the ceiling. "I just kept growing!" She says, a sudden spurt causing her to shoot through the roof. "I wasn't satisfied with just outgrowing the house, though..." you hear her say. You can see her legs swelling larger as she continues to grow. She steps out of the house, a loud booming sound following her footsteps. You wait, wondering what she is doing, when the roof and ceiling are completely torn off by her huge fingers. She reaches in and picks you up, her hand about your height. You see the ground fall beneath you as she picks you up, and you find yourself face to face with her, though she is incredibly huge by now.

"I would have stopped growing, but I liked my tiny tiny brother too much," she says, putting you back on the ground, next to her feet. She lifts a foot up and pokes you with her big toe. "You see, he liked having a gigantic sister." You blush, not having before known that she knew. "So, I thought, why... not... just... get... BIGGER?"

There was a pause, like the calm before the storm, and then your sister started growing. Within moments she had doubled, then tripled in size. Her feet get closer, and her toes are already taller than you. You suddenly notice the typewriter sitting next to you. If you want to do something, now would be the time...
1431.title: "Melissa's teasing makes her grow, and ...

choices: "Melissa's destiny is actually to become the universe, and is growing into it."
You type in something else...
14311.content:
Original chapter by unknown author

As the paper disappeared, Melissa continued her 'story'.

"But as I got taller and bigger, people got worried I was gonna start hurting and stuff, but I told them I wouldn't, I just liked growing bigger! Nobody's worried, so I just keep going!" said Melissa, pushing past 1,000 feet tall. "Even so, it's not like anyone could stop my growing!"

You continued looking up at your ever-growing sister. Suddenly a massive and still enlarging hand reached down and with very tender care picked you up and lifted you hundreds of feet into the air as Melissa held you.

"After everyone understood, I decided to REALLY start growing!" as Melissa said this, her size really went skyrocketing, 2,000 feet, a half-mile, 3,000 feet, and so on. "But even so, I knew my little bro just loved his growing sister, so of course I aim to please!" She shot past 4,000 feet, and soon finally beat a whole mile tall.

You noticed the typewriter suddenly appear next to you, which was rather surprising. You're actually feeling a little woozy from the lack of oxygen, although Melissa seems fine.

Forcing yourself to stay awake, you carefully, but quickly type out...
14311.title: Gentle and Safe Melissa

choices: "...time to REALLY start growing!"
You type in something before she can continue.
143111.content:
Original chapter by unknown author

It might have been from the lack of oxygen, but your thoughts had wandered from 'self-preservation' to 'how large your sister has become.' A short while after the paper vanished, the lightheaded feeling seemed to vanish as well... surviving in space apparently becoming a side effect from your latest action. Something of a genetic trait now passed down in your family, you hypothesize.

After several moments of being able to think clearly again, you realize that Melissa had still been telling her story the entire time.

"...I hope you've been paying attention so far, brother. It must be hard to keep track of how big I'm getting so I'll keep going, to keep you up to date on my growth! In fact... you probably want me to keep going now, don't you?"

You think back to what you had typed ...'become the universe'... it soon dawns on you that she won't stop anytime soon.

Suddenly, your thoughts are interrupted by Melissa's voice.

"Now, brother..."
143111.title: Melissa's Destiny

choices: I'm the only male in a world of females.
I have a remote that can change size and reality.
Women grow whenever they eat food.
If I have a woman wear something too big for her, she will grow to fit it.
You type something else...
15.content: You put some thought into what you want to type, this was a very powerful ability you now have. You wanted to make whatever you type in count. Finally deciding, you ready your hands and quickly type out...
15.title: You type in something else...

choices: That all females are the size of buildings
That I was small and they want me
Something else
151.content:
“That I am the only male in the world of females.” You typed into the typewriter and then hitting the period at the end of the sentence. Suddenly a strange and powerful feeling came across your chest as a wave of cold air hits you. After a few moments, you look at the window nearby and noticed that the entire street was filled of nothing but females, and they also seem to be going their normal business as if nothing ever happened. When you looked outside, you were just in disbelief that that just happened. You were now the only person in the world who is male in a world of females.

After seeing what the typewriter can really do, this gave you a really great idea. “Oh boy, I just wonder what I can really do with this typewriter, perhaps I can make it to....”

So what happens now?
151.title: I'm the only male in a world of females.

choices: You type out something else.
You decide to give other girls oversized gifts.
Something else.
154.content:
The paper disappears, but you don't feel like things are any different than what they were like before. You are certain the changes took place. You look back at your sister, who is smiling sweetly.

"What is it?" She asks. You simply shake your head.

"Nothing, just thinking." You say, glancing down, seeing her sandal clad feet. Melissa was short, at about 5'2", significantly shorter than yourself. Of course, because of this, she had proportionately small feet, size 7 to be exact. You realized that this would be the perfect opportunity to test out if what you typed came try. Turning back to the typewriter, you quickly type that you had a pair of size 13 sandals for you're sister.

Once you finish, the paper once again vanishes, and a shoe box of the shoes in question appear next to the typewriter.

"Oh yeah, Mel," you say, getting your sisters attention, "I almost forgot that I had bought these for you. Here you go." You say innocently, handing her the shoe box.

"Oh! Thanks bro! You didn't have too." She says as she opens the box, only to scrunch her face in confusion as she sees that the sandals are too big for her. At least for now. "Uh, these seem a little big." She pulls them out of the box. You of course knew this, but you tried to play it off.

"Really? They seem the right size to me." You say nonchalantly, hoping that she tries them on anyway. Melissa is of course not convinced, but in seemingly an effort to prove you wrong, she humors you and slips off her old shoes to put the new ones on.

"See?" She asks, but the affects are immediate, she starts inching up in height, he feet slowly filling up the extra space in her new sandals. "I told you they were too..." She cuts herself off.

"What was that?" You asked as she quickly surpasses your height, suddenly, her demeanor is back to her cheerful self.

"Huh? Oh, I was just saying thank you for the new shoes, to be honest I was kind of needing some new ones." Melissa responds as she finished growing to 6'3", her now size 13 feet easily able to fit the new sandals.

You're giddy, you could do so much more with the typewriter. Thinking on what else you could do, you decide.
154.title: One size fits all.

choices: Try it on pets
Try it on a near by farm
155.content: Does this thing only work on human maybe you should try it?
155.title: You type something else...

info.brief_description: You are given a typewriter as a present, but everything you type in becomes true.
info.description:
This is a revival of a interactive from one of my favorite authors.

Rules:

-No killing the main character or destroying the typewriter.

-No ending the story.

-Don't make things too sexual.

-Keep giantess clothed, going as far as a swimsuit.

-Anyone grown with the typewriter, if not already gentle, will become gentle.

-There is no minimum or maximum size. Edit: If you make the main character smaller, then no more than 1 foot tall.

-If the main character changes size, the typewriter will change size with them.

-The main character can only grow beyond normal size if she is female. (Thus, any choice that lets the main character grow also makes her a female)

-Please don't make size change too drastic within a single chapter. I want the size change to be slow.

-At the very least, unless it is a choice chapter, write 2 paragraphs.

-For the most part, keep girls that the story focuses on 16+ in age.

-I will edit or even delete chapters that I feel as though aren't appropriate.
